recipe.title: 3-Ingredient Microwave Caramel Sauce
ingredients: A 12-ounce microwave-safe mug (preferably thin-walled) or deep bowl
instructions: Place butter in mug and microwave on high 30 seconds. Add brown sugar, cream, and salt; stir to combine, and microwave on high 30 seconds. Carefully remove, stir, and microwave on high 15 seconds. Stir and serve.
Do Ahead Caramel sauce can be made 1 week ahead. Store in an airtight container and chill. Gently reheat to use.
